item.title: "在美国 247 年的历史上，一共有 2000 多位参议员，但只有 12 位是黑人，而且只有三位是黑人女性。"@RachelVScott 报道了三位黑人女性，她们的目标是在 2024 年历史性地赢得参议院选举：
item.description:
“There have been more than 2,000 senators in America's 247-year history, but just 12 have been Black, and only three have been Black women."@RachelVScott reports on the three Black women aiming for historic Senate wins in 2024: https://t.co/kAF5VUdfPG pic.twitter.com/EdsmNOF3zd

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 根据美国疾病预防控制中心（CDC）的数据，从 2019-2021 学年到 2022-2023 学年，全国麻腮风疫苗覆盖率下降了 2%，这意味着全国约有 25 万名幼儿园儿童面临感染麻疹的风险。
item.description:
National MMR coverage has dropped 2% from the 2019-2021 school year to the 2022-2023 school year, which means approximately 250,000 kindergartners are at risk for measles infection around the country, according to the CDC. https://t.co/v3Y5wmyNT6

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: .@JamesAALongman问乌克兰总统泽连斯基是否对美国 "失去信心"，因为一项向乌克兰提供额外军事援助的法案在国会陷入僵局。但他希望援助 "快点到来"。
item.description:
.@JamesAALongman asked Ukrainian Pres. Zelenskyy if he's "lost faith" in the U.S. as a bill that would provide additional military aid to his country is stalled in Congress.

“No, no, no,” was Zelenskyy's emphatic response. But he wants aid to “hurry up.” https://t.co/ogrBkKPwa1 pic.twitter.com/fQvzu0sCkl

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: 民主党参议员塔米-达克沃斯（Tammy Duckworth）告诉@MarthaRaddatz，她将支持总统拜登的报告计划，即利用行政措施来增加移民申请庇护的难度，"因为我们确实在边境遇到了危机"。
item.description:
Democratic Sen. Tammy Duckworth tells @MarthaRaddatz that she would support Pres. Biden’s reported plan to use executive action to make it harder for migrants to claim asylum “because we do have a crisis at the border.” https://t.co/tVprkabJzq pic.twitter.com/ex3UHRPhbb

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 长期以来，一年一度的保守派政治行动会议一直是未来总统的试炼场，罗纳德-里根和唐纳德-特朗普等重量级人物的政治抱负都是在这里实现的。

item.title: 二十多年来，中国首次将大熊猫送往美国，这让圣地亚哥动物园非常高兴，该动物园正准备接收一对大熊猫，其中可能包括该动物园两位前居民的雌性后代。
item.description:
For the first time in more than two decades, China is sending pandas to the U.S. to the delight of the San Diego Zoo, which is preparing to receive a pair that could include a female descendent of two of the zoo's former residents. https://t.co/Soh5FXtuvf

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: 自 1789 年美国参议院成立以来，已有 2000 多人在参议院任职。但只有 12 人是黑人，只有 3 人是黑人女性，而且他们从未一起担任过参议员。
item.description:
More than 2,000 people have served in the U.S. Senate since it was established in 1789. But just 12 have been Black -- and only three have been Black women, none of whom have ever served together.

That could soon change. https://t.co/Wr6Bb7bOU2

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024
